author: slava77
body:
Reco comparisons map is updated:
- for a newly added workflow Run3 fast sim 11634.301 from cms-sw/cmssw#37493
- GPU workflow mappings were added for somewhat commonly used workflows (I checked several recent PRs)

Add monitoring for new branches (based on diff of products in 1230pre2 vs 1240pre4)
- beamSpotTable from cms-sw/cmssw#36037 
- genProtonTable from cms-sw/cmssw#36080
- displacedMuons from cms-sw/cmssw#37805

@cms-sw/reconstruction-l2
title: reco comparisons: updated maps and monitoring for new products
